COMBATNUMBERS.CONTROLS.title: Combat Numbers
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.configHint: Configure the appearance of the Combat Numbers display on the canvas for all players.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.fontSizeHint: Font Size is calculated relative to the Scene's Grid Size.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.dropShadowAlphaHi: The transparency of the drop shadow. 0 is invisible, 1 is completely visible.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.waitTimeHint: The amount of time (in seconds) between an HP change and displaying the Combat Numbers.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.lingerTimeHint: The amount of time (in seconds) for the Combat Numbers to linger on the screen after being displayed.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.showControlsHint: Shows the Canvas Layers Controls button and its tools. Denoted as a '#'.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.showModifiersHint: Shows a "-" in front of a Combat Number when damage is dealt, or shows a "+" when healed.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.maskDefaultHint: The default state of the masking toggle in the Canvas Layer Controls tools. Checked means ON, unchecked means OFF.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.maskDamageHint: When masking is on, this is the text that will display for damage instead of the numeric value.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.maskHealHint: When masking is on, this is the text that will display for healing instead of the numeric value.
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.hpObjectPathHint: ⚠️ For advanced users. This is the object path which is used to locate the "HP" attribute within the Actor or Token Entity objects. Each child property is traversed via a ".". Leave blank to use the default for many game systems (which is "attributes.hp.value")
COMBATNUMBERS.SETTINGS.tempHpObjectPathH: ⚠️ For advanced users. This is the same as "HP Object Path" except it is referencing the temporary HP attribute. Leave blank to use the default for many game systems or if you do not have temporary HP in your game system. (The default is "attributes.hp.temp")
